email_text:
Subject: Important Message from the Department of Education - Loan Forgiveness Program

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you about an exciting opportunity to have your student loans completely forgiven through a special program initiated by the Department of Education. This program is designed to provide financial relief to individuals struggling with their student loan debt.

To qualify for this loan forgiveness program, you must meet certain criteria such as being a current student loan borrower, having made consistent payments on your loans, and demonstrating financial hardship. Once approved, you could be eligible to have your entire loan balance wiped clean, giving you a fresh start without the burden of student debt.

To take advantage of this incredible opportunity, simply click on the link below and fill out the necessary information to see if you qualify for loan forgiveness. Don't miss out on this chance to alleviate your financial stress and secure your financial future.

Click here to apply for loan forgiveness now: [Phishing link]

Please note that this program is time-sensitive and spaces are limited, so act quickly to secure your spot in the loan forgiveness program. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us at the Department of Education for more information.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter.

Sincerely,

The Department of Education
